tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UrbanFarmingPlotData (
  plot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  planting_date TIMESTAMP,
  harvest_date TIMESTAMP,
  yield DECIMAL,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE urban_farming_plots (
    plot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(100),
    planting_date DATE,
    yield_data DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_timeline (
    growth_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    plot_id UUID,
    growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
    growth_date DATE,
    growth_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (plot_id) REFERENCES urban_farming_plots(plot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_data (
  plot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  harvesting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  growth_stage VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE plot_location (
  plot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    plot_id INT,
    planting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE plots (
    plot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plot_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    area_m2 DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_growth (
    growth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    growth_date DATE,
    growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
    growth_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE yield_data (
    yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    yield_date DATE,
    yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    yield_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GrowthData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plot_id INT,
    growth_date DATE,
    growth_stage VARCHAR,
    humidity FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT
);
